content: Although the first quarter of 2022 has brought us unprecedented challenges we believe it's important to have a long term mindset to finish  our proven strategies while maintaining flexibility and navigating uncharted  circumstance or earning short term dynamics, strive to continuously improve our overall operational efficiency. In the first quarter, our total revenue was 93.8 million down 16.3% year-over-year from 112 million due to the pandemic prevention measures impacting the supply chain. Apparel had a solid increase of 13.7% to 67.2 million from 59.1 million in the same quarter of last year, representing 71.7% of total revenue up from 52.8% a year ago.
